description: 1-3/4 inch plexiglass squares painted on one side assembled in a checker board fashion; three piece display, central upside down 'T' shape in greens and yellow worm-like images; three bands of red running through left 'C' shape and right 'L' shape purples and yellow with bands of red
dimension: H.28 x W.87-1/2 x D.1-3/8 in., overall
title: Untitled [triptych]
